B1.question: B1
B1.name: B1
B1.label: General information about accommodation (type of accommodation)

items.text_de: Allgemeine Informationen zur Unterkunft (Art der Unterkunft)
items.text: General information about accommodation (type of accommodation)

H1v.question: H1v
H1v.name: H1v
H1v.label: The first questions are about your household. When we ask questions about your household or persons in your household, this could mean you alone if you live alone in an apartment or an accommodation unit. However it can also mean the other people living there who together make up a household. As rule these are family members living together.

items.text_de: Zunächst geht es um Ihren Haushalt. Wenn wir Fragen zu Ihrem Haushalt oder zu Personen in Ihrem Haushalt stellen, können damit Sie alleine gemeint sein, wenn Sie alleine in einer Wohnung oder Wohneinheit leben. Es kann aber auch die Gemeinschaft gemeint sein, die zusammen einen Haushalt bildet. In der Regel sind das zusammenlebende Familienangehörige.
items.text: The first questions are about your household. When we ask questions about your household or persons in your household, this could mean you alone if you live alone in an apartment or an accommodation unit. However it can also mean the other people living there who together make up a household. As rule these are family members living together.

H2.question: H2
H2.name: H2
H2.label: In what type of accommodation does the interviewee live?

items.text_de: In welcher Art von Unterkunft wohnt die Befragungsperson?
items.text: In what type of accommodation does the interviewee live?

answers.label_de: In einer privaten Wohnung, einem privaten Haus
answers.label: In a private apartment, a private house

H3.question: H3
H3.name: H3
H3.label: Are there further apartments in this building in which refugees live?

items.text_de: Gibt es in diesem Haus noch weitere Wohnungen, in denen geflüchtete Personen wohnen?
items.text: Are there further apartments in this building in which refugees live?

H4.question: H4
H4.name: H4
H4.label: When did you move into this apartment?

items.text_de: Wann sind Sie in diese Wohnung eingezogen?
items.text: When did you move into this apartment?

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

items.text_de: Monat
items.text: Month

H5.question: H5
H5.name: H5
H5.label: Did you move into an existing household or did you establish a new household?

items.text_de: Sind Sie in einen bereits bestehenden Haushalt zugezogen oder haben Sie einen neuen Haushalt gegründet?
items.text: Did you move into an existing household or did you establish a new household?

H6.question: H6
H6.name: H6
H6.label: How did you find this apartment?

items.text_de: Wie haben Sie diese Wohnung gefunden?
items.text: How did you find this apartment?

answers.label: via newspaper advertisements, advertisements on the internet

answers.label_de: über Hilfsorganisationen wie AWO, Caritas, Rotes Kreuz
answers.label: via aid organisations such as AWO, Caritas, Red Cross

H7.question: H7
H7.name: H7
H7.label: How large is the total living space in this flat?

items.text_de: Wie groß ist die Wohnfläche dieser Wohnung insgesamt?
items.text: How large is the total living space in this flat?

items.text_de: qm
items.text: sqm

H8.question: H8
H8.name: H8
H8.label: And how many rooms are in the apartment?

items.text_de: Und wie viele Räume hat Ihre Wohnung?
items.instruction_de: Gemeint sind Räume ab 6 qm, ohne Küche und ohne Bad.
items.text: And how many rooms are in the apartment?
items.instruction: This means rooms over 6m2 in size, excluding the kitchen and bathroo

items.text_de: Räume
items.text: Rooms

H9.question: H9
H9.name: H9
H9.label: How do you rate the size of the apartment overall? For your household is it…

items.text_de: Wie beurteilen Sie insgesamt die Größe Ihrer Wohnung? Ist sie für Ihren Haushalt …
items.text: How do you rate the size of the apartment overall? For your household is it…

items.text_de: Wohnungsausstattung
items.text: Dwelling features

H10.question: H10
H10.name: H10
H10.label: Now there are a few questions about how your apartment is furnished.

items.text_de: Jetzt kommen ein paar Fragen darüber, wie Ihre Wohnung ausgestattet ist.
items.text: Now there are a few questions about how your apartment is furnished.

H11.question: H11
H11.name: H11
H11.label: Is your apartment suitably furnished for elderly or disabled persons?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung eine altengerechte, barrierefreie Wohnausstattung?
items.text: Is your apartment suitably furnished for elderly or disabled persons?

H12.question: H12
H12.name: H12
H12.label: Does your apartment have underfloor heating (full or partial)?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung eine Fußbodenheizung (ganz oder teilweise)?
items.text: Does your apartment have underfloor heating (full or partial)?

H13.question: H13
H13.name: H13
H13.label: Does your apartment have a balcony or a terrace?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung ein Balkon oder eine Terrasse?
items.text: Does your apartment have a balcony or a terrace?

H14.question: H14
H14.name: H14
H14.label: Does your apartment have its own garden or use of a garden?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung ein eigener Garten oder Gartenbenutzung?
items.text: Does your apartment have its own garden or use of a garden?

H15.question: H15
H15.name: H15
H15.label: Does your apartment have an alarm system?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung eine Alarmanlage?
items.text: Does your apartment have an alarm system?

H16.question: H16
H16.name: H16
H16.label: Does your apartment have central heating or a heating system covering one floor?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung eine Zentralheizung oder Etagenheizung?
items.text: Does your apartment have central heating or a heating system covering one floor?

H17.question: H17
H17.name: H17
H17.label: Does your apartment have a lift in the building?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung ein Aufzug / Fahrstuhl im Haus?
items.text: Does your apartment have a lift in the building?

H18.question: H18
H18.name: H18
H18.label: Does your apartment have a cellar/storerooms?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung ein Keller / Abstellräume?
items.text: Does your apartment have a cellar/storerooms?

H19.question: H19
H19.name: H19
H19.label: Does your apartment have a garage/parking space?

items.text_de: Gehört zu Ihrer Wohnung eine Garage / ein Stellplatz?
items.text: Does your apartment have a garage/parking space?

H20.question: H20
H20.name: H20
H20.label: Was this apartment fully furnished by you or was it already partly or fully furnished before you moved in?

items.text_de: Wurde diese Wohnung von Ihnen komplett selbst eingerichtet oder war sie schon vor dem Einzug teilweise oder komplett möbliert?
items.text: Was this apartment fully furnished by you or was it already partly or fully furnished before you moved in?

H21.question: H21
H21.name: H21
H21.label: Does your household have one or more telephone landlines?

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt einen oder mehrere Telefon-Festnetzanschlüsse?
items.text: Does your household have one or more telephone landlines?

H22.question: H22
H22.name: H22
H22.label: Does your household have one or more telephone landlines?

items.text_de: Unter wie vielen Festnetznummern ist Ihr Haushalt telefonisch erreichbar?
items.text: Does your household have one or more telephone landlines?

items.text_de: Anzahl Festnetznummern
items.text: Number of landline numbers

H23.question: H23
H23.name: H23
H23.label: Are there one or more mobile phones in your household which are also used?

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt ein oder mehrere Mobiltelefone (Handys) oder Smartphones, die auch genutzt werden?
items.text: Are there one or more mobile phones in your household which are also used?

H24.question: H24
H24.name: H24
H24.label: Does your household have one or more telephone landlines?

items.text_de: Wie viele einfache Mobiltelefone (Handys) und wie viele Smartphones, gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt?
items.text: Does your household have one or more telephone landlines?

items.text_de: Anzahl einfache Mobiltelefone (Handys)
items.text: Number of mobile phones use

items.text_de: Anzahl Smartphones
items.text: number of smart phones

H25.question: H25
H25.name: H25
H25.label: Does your household have an internet connection?

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt einen Internetanschluss?
items.text: Does your household have an internet connection?

H26.question: H26
H26.name: H26
H26.label: How many members of the household use this internet connection?

items.text_de: Wie viele Haushaltsmitglieder nutzen diesen Internetanschluss?
items.text: How many members of the household use this internet connection?

items.text_de: Anzahl Internetnutzer im Haushalt
items.text: Number of internet users in the household

B2.question: B2
B2.name: B2
B2.label: Continuation: General information about accommodation (rent/first or shared accommodation)

items.text_de: Fortsetzung: Allgemeine Informationen zur Unterkunft (Miete/ erste Unterkunft/ Gemeinschaftsunterkunft)
items.text: Continuation: General information about accommodation (rent/first or shared accommodation)

H27.question: H27
H27.name: H27
H27.label: Do you or does another member of the household pay the rent or is it paid directly by a state agency?

items.text_de: Zahlen Sie selbst oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied die Miete oder wird diese direkt von einer staatlichen Stelle übernommen?
items.text: Do you or does another member of the household pay the rent or is it paid directly by a state agency?

answers.label: Myself or another member of the household

answers.label_de: Miete wird direkt von einer staatlichen Stelle übernommen
answers.label: Rent paid directly by a state agency

H28.question: H28
H28.name: H28
H28.label: How much is the monthly rent at present?

items.text_de: Wie hoch ist derzeit die monatliche Miete?
items.text: How much is the monthly rent at present?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

items.text_de: Weiß nicht
items.text: Do not know

H29.question: H29
H29.name: H29
H29.label: Is the dwelling, that you live in, our first private dwelling in Germany?

items.text_de: Ist die Wohnung, in der Sie jetzt wohnen, Ihre erste private Wohnung in Deutschland?
items.text: Is the dwelling, that you live in, our first private dwelling in Germany?

answers.label_de: Ja, es ist meine erste private Wohnung in Deutschland
answers.label: Yes, it is my first private dwelling in Germany

answers.label_de: Nein, habe vorher schon in mindestens einer anderen privaten Wohnung in Deutschland gelebt
answers.label: No, I've been lived at least in another private dwelling in Germany

H30.question: H30
H30.name: H30
H30.label: In which town in Germany have you have your first private dwelling? If there is more than one town with the same name, please also state the name of the nearest city.

items.text_de:
In welchem Ort in Deutschland hatten Sie Ihre erste private Wohnung?
Bitte nennen Sie bei Orten, die es mehrmals gibt bzw. bei kleinen Orten auch den Namen der nahegelegenen Stadt.
items.text: In which town in Germany have you have your first private dwelling? If there is more than one town with the same name, please also state the name of the nearest city.

items.text_de: Ort:
items.text: Location:

items.text_de: Bei:
items.text: Closest city:

H31.question: H31
H31.name: H31
H31.label: In which federal state is this location?

items.text_de: In welchem Bundesland liegt dieser Ort?
items.text: In which federal state is this location?

H32.question: H32
H32.name: H32
H32.label: When did you move to your first private dwelling in Germany?

items.text_de: Wann sind Sie in diese erste private Wohnung in Deutschland eingezogen?
items.text: When did you move to your first private dwelling in Germany?

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

items.text_de: Monat
items.text: Month

H33.question: H33
H33.name: H33
H33.label: What was your main reason for choosing this town as your first home in Germany?

items.text_de: Was war der Hauptgrund dafür, dass Sie in diesem Ort Ihre erste Wohnung hatten?
items.text: What was your main reason for choosing this town as your first home in Germany?

answers.label_de: Weil dort Freunde und Bekannte gelebt haben
answers.label: Because friends and acquaintances lived there

answers.label_de: Durch Zuweisung einer Behörde (z.B. als Flüchtlinge oder Asylbewerber)
answers.label: Placed there by a government agency (for example as a refugees, asylum seeker, ethnic German immigrant)

answers.label_de: Befristete Beschäftigung oder Ausbildung war beendet
answers.label: I completed a temporary job or apprenticeship

answers.label_de: Wegen der praktischen Lage (z.B. Arbeitsplatznähe, Hochschulnähe)
answers.label: Because of easy accessible position (e.g. close to workplace, school)

H34.question: H34
H34.name: H34
H34.label: What kind of shared accommodation is it?

items.text_de: Was für eine Gemeinschaftsunterkunft ist das?
items.text: What kind of shared accommodation is it?

answers.label_de: Eine kleinräumige Gemeinschaftsunterkunft mit einzelnen, getrennten Wohnräumen
answers.label: Small-scale shared accommodation with individual, partitioned living areas

H35.question: H35
H35.name: H35
H35.label: When did you move into this shared accommodation?

items.text_de: Wann sind Sie in diese Gemeinschaftsunterkunft eingezogen?
items.text: When did you move into this shared accommodation?

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

items.text_de: Monat
items.text: Month

items.text_de: Fragen zur Ausstattung der Wohneinheit
items.text: Questions about domestic equipments

H36.question: H36
H36.name: H36
H36.label: Is there a self-contained unit available for you personally or your family?

items.text_de: Steht Ihnen persönlich oder Ihrer Familie eine abgeschlossene Wohneinheit zur Verfügung?
items.text: Is there a self-contained unit available for you personally or your family?

H37.question: H37
H37.name: H37
H37.label: How many people in total share your unit?

items.text_de: Wie viele Personen teilen sich Ihre Wohneinheit insgesamt?
items.text: How many people in total share your unit?

items.text_de: Personen
items.text: Persons

H38.question: H38
H38.name: H38
H38.label: Approximately how large is the living area of this unit in total?

items.text_de: Wie groß ist die Wohnfläche dieser Wohneinheit in etwa insgesamt?
items.text: Approximately how large is the living area of this unit in total?

items.text_de: qm
items.text: m2

H39.question: H39
H39.name: H39
H39.label: Did you fully furnish this unit yourself or was it already partially or fully furnished before you moved in?

items.text_de: Wurde diese Wohneinheit von Ihnen komplett selbst eingerichtet oder war sie schon vor dem Einzug teilweise oder komplett möbliert?
items.text: Did you fully furnish this unit yourself or was it already partially or fully furnished before you moved in?

H40.question: H40
H40.name: H40
H40.label: Do you or other persons in your household own at least one mobile phone?

items.text_de: Besitzen Sie oder andere Personen in Ihrem Haushalt mindestens ein Mobiltelefon (Handy) oder ein Smartphone?
items.text: Do you or other persons in your household own at least one mobile phone?

items.text_de: 1 Ja, einfaches Mobiltelefon (Handy)
items.text: Yes, number of mobile phones use

items.text_de: 2 Ja, Smartphone
items.text: 2 Yes smart phone

items.text_de: 3 Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, none of these

H41.question: H41
H41.name: H41
H41.label: Does your accommodation have an internet connection (including WLAN) which you can use?

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrer Unterkunft einen Internetanschluss (inklusive WLAN), den Sie nutzen können?
items.text: Does your accommodation have an internet connection (including WLAN) which you can use?

B3.question: B3
B3.name: B3
B3.label: Continuation: General information about accommodation (rent(living area)

items.text: Continuation: General information about accommodation (rent(living area)

H42.question: H42
H42.name: H42
H42.label: Do you or does another member of the household pay rent for your accommodation?

items.text_de: Zahlen Sie selbst oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied Miete für Ihre Unterkunft?
items.text: Do you or does another member of the household pay rent for your accommodation?

H43.question: H43
H43.name: H43
H43.label: How much is the monthly rent at present?

items.text_de: Wie hoch ist derzeit die monatliche Miete?
items.text: How much is the monthly rent at present?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

items.text_de: Weiß nicht
items.text: Do not know

H44.question: H44
H44.name: H44
H44.label: What about crime? How safe is it in your accommodation?

items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Kriminalität? Wie sicher ist es in Ihrer Unterkunft?
items.text: What about crime? How safe is it in your accommodation?

H45.question: H45
H45.name: H45
H45.label: And what about crime? How safe is your neighborhood?

items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Kriminalität? Wie sicher ist Ihr Wohngebiet?
items.text: And what about crime? How safe is your neighborhood?

H46.question: H46
H46.name: H46
H46.label:
Are you allowed because of legal regulations / restrictions currently only in a certain place
or a particular federal state or can you choose your place of residence yourself?

items.text_de: Dürfen Sie wegen rechtlichen Vorschriften / Einschränkungen aktuell nur in einem bestimmten Ort oder einem bestimmten Bundesland wohnen oder können Sie Ihren Wohnort selbst wählen?
items.text:
Are you allowed because of legal regulations / restrictions currently only in a certain place
or a particular federal state or can you choose your place of residence yourself?

answers.label_de: Ich darf nur in einem bestimmten Ort wohnen
answers.label: I am only allowed to live in a certain location

answers.label_de: Ich darf nur in einem bestimmten Bundesland wohnen
answers.label: I am only allowed to live in a certain federal state

answers.label_de: Ich kann meinen Wohnort selbst wählen
answers.label: I can choose my place of residence myself

items.text_de: staatliche Leistungen
items.text: State Benefits

H47.question: H47
H47.name: H47
H47.label: We would now like to know whether you or another member of the household is currently receiving any one the following state benefits.

items.text_de: Jetzt geht es darum, ob Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit eine der folgenden staatlichen Leistungen erhält.
items.text: We would now like to know whether you or another member of the household is currently receiving any one the following state benefits.

H48.question: H48
H48.name: H48
H48.label: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving benefits under the Asylbewerberleistungsgesetz (Asylum Seekers' Benefit Act) (AsylbLG)?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Leistungen nach dem Asylbewerberleistungsgesetz (AsylbLG)?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving benefits under the Asylbewerberleistungsgesetz (Asylum Seekers' Benefit Act) (AsylbLG)?

H49.question: H49
H49.name: H49
H49.label: What is the amount currently received per month by you or your household under the Asylum Seeker's Benefit Act (AsylbLG)?

items.text_de: Wie hoch ist der Betrag, den Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt nach dem Asylbewerberleistungsgesetz (AsylbLG) derzeit pro Monat erhalten?
items.text: What is the amount currently received per month by you or your household under the Asylum Seeker's Benefit Act (AsylbLG)?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H50.question: H50
H50.name: H50
H50.label: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving child benefit?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Kindergeld?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving child benefit?

H51.question: H51
H51.name: H51
H51.label: How much child benefit are you or your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Wie viel Kindergeld erhalten Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt derzeit pro Monat?
items.text: How much child benefit are you or your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H52.question: H52
H52.name: H52
H52.label: For how many children are you or is your household receiving child benefit?

items.text_de: Für wie viele Kinder erhalten Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Kindergeld?
items.text: For how many children are you or is your household receiving child benefit?

items.text_de: Anzahl Kinder
items.text: Number of children

H53.question: H53
H53.name: H53
H53.label: Are you or is another member of the household receiving child benefit supplements (benefit for low-wage earners applied for in addition to the child benefit)?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied Kindergeldzuschlag (zusätzlich zum Kindergeld beantragte Leistung für Geringverdiener)?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household receiving child benefit supplements (benefit for low-wage earners applied for in addition to the child benefit)?

H54.name: H54
H54.label: How much child benefit supplement are you or is your household currently receiving per month?

items.text: How much child benefit supplement are you or is your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H55.question: H55
H55.name: H55
H55.label: Did you or one of the members of your family receive any of the following benefits last year?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit für eines oder mehrere Kinder Leistungen aus dem Bildungspaket?
items.text: Did you or one of the members of your family receive any of the following benefits last year?

H56.question: H56
H56.name: H56
H56.label: What is the current amount of education package for your household per month?

items.text_de: Wie hoch ist der Betrag der Leistung aus dem Bildungspaket für Ihren Haushalt derzeit pro Monat?
items.text: What is the current amount of education package for your household per month?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euro

H57.question: H57
H57.name: H57
H57.label: Are you or is another member of the household member currently receiving unemployment benefit II (Hartz IV) including income support and accommodation expenses?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Arbeitslosengeld II (Hartz IV) einschließlich Sozialgeld und Unterkunftskosten?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household member currently receiving unemployment benefit II (Hartz IV) including income support and accommodation expenses?

H58.name: H58
H58.label: How much unemployment benefit II (Hartz IV) are you or is your household currently receiving per month?

items.text: How much unemployment benefit II (Hartz IV) are you or is your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H59.name: H59
H59.label: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving nursing care insurance benefits?

items.text: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving nursing care insurance benefits?

H60.name: H60

items.text: How much are you or is your household currently receiving per month from the nursing care insurance?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H61.question: H61
H61.name: H61
H61.label: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving ongoing subsistence assistance/assistance for special circumstances?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit laufende Hilfe zum Lebensunterhalt / Hilfe in besonderen Lebenslagen?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving ongoing subsistence assistance/assistance for special circumstances?

H62.question: H62
H62.name: H62
H62.label: Are you or is another household member receiving regular subsistence allowance/assistance in special situations?

items.text: Are you or is another household member receiving regular subsistence allowance/assistance in special situations?

items.text: Euros

H63.question: H63
H63.name: H63
H63.label: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Grundsicherung im Alter und bei Erwerbsminderung?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Grundsicherung im Alter und bei Erwerbsminderung?
items.text: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Grundsicherung im Alter und bei Erwerbsminderung?

H64.question: H64
H64.name: H64
H64.label: How much basic subsistence income for the elderly and for those with reduced earning capacity are you is or your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Wie viel Grundsicherung im Alter und bei Erwerbsminderung erhalten Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt derzeit pro Monat?
items.text: How much basic subsistence income for the elderly and for those with reduced earning capacity are you is or your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H65.question: H65
H65.name: H65
H65.label: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy)?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Wohngeld (Miet- und Lastenzuschuss)?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy)?

H66.question: H66
H66.name: H66
H66.label: How much housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy) are you or is your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Wie viel Wohngeld (Miet- und Lastenzuschuss) erhalten Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt derzeit pro Monat?
items.instruction_de: Falls nicht in den Unterkunftskosten von ALG II, Laufender Hilfe zum Lebensunterhalt, Grundsicherung im Alter enthalten.
items.text: How much housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy) are you or is your household currently receiving per month?
items.instruction: If not included in the accommodation costs of unemployment benefit, regular subsistence allowance, basic assistance income for the elderly.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

B4.question: B4
B4.name: B4
B4.label: Continuation: General information of accommodation (financial situation)

items.text_de: Fortsetzung: Allgemeine Informationen zur Unterkunft (Finanzielle Lage)
items.text: Continuation: General information of accommodation (financial situation)

H67.question: H67
H67.name: H67
H67.label: Taking all income together, how much is the current monthly net household income of all members of the household?

items.text_de: Wie hoch ist das monatliche Haushaltsnettoeinkommen aller Haushaltsmitglieder heute, wenn man alle Einkünfte und Sozialleistungen zusammenrechnet?
items.instruction_de: Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, schätzen Sie bitte.
items.text: Taking all income together, how much is the current monthly net household income of all members of the household?
items.instruction: If you don't know the exact amount, please state an approximate figure.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H68.question: H68
H68.name: H68
H68.label: In the last month, were the amounts of your household's income and expenses the same, or was income higher than expenses or were expenses higher than income?

items.text_de: Waren die Einnahmen und die Ausgaben Ihres Haushalts im letzten Monat gleich hoch, oder waren die Einnahmen höher als die Ausgaben, oder waren die Ausgaben höher als die Einnahmen?
items.text: In the last month, were the amounts of your household's income and expenses the same, or was income higher than expenses or were expenses higher than income?

answers.label_de: Einnahmen waren höher als die Ausgaben. Es konnten Ersparnisse gebildet werden.
answers.label: Income was higher than expenses. It was possible to save money.

answers.label_de: Ausgaben waren höher als die Einnahmen. Es entstand ein Fehlbetrag.
answers.label: Expense were higher than income. There was a shortfall.

answers.label_de: Einnahmen und Ausgaben waren gleich hoch.
answers.label: Income and expenses were the same

H69.question: H69
H69.name: H69
H69.label: How much were you or your household able to save last month?

items.text_de: Wie hoch war der Betrag, den Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt im letzten Monat sparen konnten?
items.instruction_de: Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, schätzen Sie bitte.
items.text: How much were you or your household able to save last month?
items.instruction: If you don't know the exact amount, please state an approximate figure.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H70.question: H70
H70.name: H70
H70.label: How much was the shortfall during the past month?

items.text_de: Wie hoch war der Fehlbetrag im letzten Monat?
items.instruction_de: Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, schätzen Sie bitte.
items.text: How much was the shortfall during the past month?
items.instruction: If you don't know the exact amount, please state an approximate figure.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H71.question: H71
H71.name: H71
H71.label: How did you or household make up for the shortfall?

items.text_de: Wie haben Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt den Fehlbetrag ausgeglichen?
items.instruction_de: Bitte geben Sie alles zutreffende an!
items.text: How did you or household make up for the shortfall?

items.text_de: Aufnahme eines Kredits
items.text: Took out a loan

items.text_de: Geld von Freunden, Verwandten oder Bekannten geliehen
items.text: Borrowed money from friends, relatives or aquaintances

items.text_de: Verbrauch vorhandener Ersparnisse
items.text: Used existing savings

items.text_de: Weiß nicht
items.text: Don't know

H72.question: H72
H72.name: H72
H72.label: Do you or does another person in your household have a bank account?

items.text_de: Verfügen Sie oder eine andere Person in Ihrem Haushalt über ein Bankkonto?
items.text: Do you or does another person in your household have a bank account?

H73.question: H73
H73.name: H73
H73.label: Since when have you or has another person in your household had a bank account in Germany?

items.text_de: Seit wann verfügen Sie oder eine andere Person in Ihrem Haushalt über ein Bankkonto in Deutschland?
items.instruction_de: Wenn mehrere Personen in Ihrem Haushalt über ein Bankkonto verfügen, ist das Erste gemeint.
items.text: Since when have you or has another person in your household had a bank account in Germany?
items.instruction: If several people in your household have a bank account, the first person is meant.

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

items.text_de: Monat
items.text: Month

H74.question: H74
H74.name: H74
H74.label: To what extent do you or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of everyday use through contributions in kind received from other people?

items.text_de: In welchem Umfang decken Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Ihren Bedarf an Lebensmitteln und anderen Dingen des täglichen Bedarfs über Sachleistungen, die Sie von Dritten bekommen?
items.text: To what extent do you or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of everyday use through contributions in kind received from other people?

H75.question: H75
H75.name: H75
H75.label: To what extent do you or does your household use coupons to obtain food and other items of everyday use?

items.text_de: In welchem Umfang nutzen Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Gutscheine, um sich mit Lebensmitteln und Dingen des täglichen Bedarfs zu versorgen?
items.text: To what extent do you or does your household use coupons to obtain food and other items of everyday use?

H76.question: H76
H76.name: H76
H76.label: To what extent do your or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of daily use through normal shopping where you do not fall back on coupons or contributions in kind?

items.text_de: In welchem Umfang decken Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Ihren Bedarf an Lebensmitteln und anderen Dingen des täglichen Bedarfs über normale Einkäufe, bei denen Sie nicht auf Sachleistungen oder Gutscheine zurückgreifen?
items.text: To what extent do your or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of daily use through normal shopping where you do not fall back on coupons or contributions in kind?

H77.question: H77
H77.name: H77
H77.label: Which of the following points apply to your household?

items.text_de: Welche der folgenden Punkte treffen auf Ihren Haushalt zu?
items.text: Which of the following points apply to your household?

H78.question: H78
H78.name: H78
H78.label: The household has financial reserves for emergencies.

items.text_de: Der Haushalt hat finanzielle Rücklagen für Notfälle.
items.text: The household has financial reserves for emergencies.

H79.question: H79
H79.name: H79
H79.label: Friends are invited for a meal at least once per month.

items.text_de: Mindestens einmal im Monat werden Freunde zum Essen eingeladen.
items.text: Friends are invited for a meal at least once per month.

H80.question: H80
H80.name: H80
H80.label: A hot meal with meat, fish or poultry is eaten at least every two days.

items.text_de: Mindestens alle zwei Tage wird eine warme Mahlzeit mit Fleisch, Fisch oder Geflügel gegessen.
items.text: A hot meal with meat, fish or poultry is eaten at least every two days.

H81.question: H81
H81.name: H81
H81.label: At least once per month a leisure activity is pursued, such as going to the cinema, a concert, sporting event or similar.

items.text_de: Mindestens einmal im Monat wird einer Freizeitbeschäftigung wie Kino, Konzertbesuch, Sportveranstaltung oder Ähnlichem nachgegangen
items.text: At least once per month a leisure activity is pursued, such as going to the cinema, a concert, sporting event or similar.

H82.question: H82
H82.name: H82
H82.label: Worn-out furniture is renewed, even if it is still functional.

items.text_de: Abgenutzte Möbel, auch wenn sie noch funktionsfähig sind, werden durch neue ersetzt.
items.text: Worn-out furniture is renewed, even if it is still functional.

H83.question: H83
H83.name: H83
H83.label: Worn-out clothing is replaced with new clothing.

items.text_de: Abgetragene Kleidungsstücke werden durch neue ersetzt.
items.text: Worn-out clothing is replaced with new clothing.

H84.question: H84
H84.name: H84
H84.label: During the cold months the apartment is always warmly heated.

items.text_de: Die Wohnung wird in kalten Monaten angenehm warm beheizt.
items.text: During the cold months the apartment is always warmly heated.

H85.question: H85
H85.name: H85
H85.label: Everyone in the household has a small sum available for personal use each week.

items.text_de: Jeder im Haushalt hat wöchentlich einen kleinen Betrag für sich ganz persönlich zur Verfügung.
items.text: Everyone in the household has a small sum available for personal use each week.

H86.question: H86
H86.name: H86
H86.label: Everyone in the household owns at least two pairs of outdoor shoes in the right size (including an all-weather pair)

items.text_de: Jeder im Haushalt besitzt mindestens zwei Paar Straßenschuhe in passender Größe (einschließlich Allwetterpaar).
items.text: Everyone in the household owns at least two pairs of outdoor shoes in the right size (including an all-weather pair)

H87.question: H87
H87.name: H87
H87.label: Is there someone in your household who through reasons of age, health or disability needs constant help or care

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt jemanden, der aus Altersgründen, Krankheitsgründen oder wegen einer Behinderung dauernd hilfebedürftig oder pflegebedürftig ist?
items.text: Is there someone in your household who through reasons of age, health or disability needs constant help or care

H88.question: H88
H88.name: H88
H88.label: Are there children in your household who were not born until 1999 or after

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt Kinder, die erst im Jahr 2001 oder später geboren sind?
items.text: Are there children in your household who were not born until 1999 or after

H89.question: H89
H89.name: H89
H89.label: How many children who were born in 1999 or after are living in your household

items.text_de: Wie viele Kinder, die erst im Jahr 2001 oder später geboren sind, gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt?
items.text: How many children who were born in 1999 or after are living in your household

items.text_de: Kinderschleife
items.text: children loop

B004.question: B004
B004.name: B004
B004.label: Are there children in your household who were not born until 2000 or after

items.text_de: Fragen über Kinder, die erst im Jahr 2000 oder später geboren sind
items.text: Are there children in your household who were not born until 2000 or after

H90.question: H90
H90.name: H90
H90.label: The following questions are asked for up to six children in the household. Please start with the oldest child born in 1999 or after and then work down by age, with the youngest child last.

items.text_de:
Die folgenden Fragen werden für bis zu sechs Kinder im Haushalt gestellt.
Beginnen Sie bitte mit dem ältesten Kind, das im Jahr 2001 oder danach geboren ist, und dann dem Alter nach, das jüngste Kind zuletzt.
items.text: The following questions are asked for up to six children in the household. Please start with the oldest child born in 1999 or after and then work down by age, with the youngest child last.

H91.question: H91
H91.name: H91
H91.label: In which year was the oldest child born?

items.text_de: In welchem Jahr ist das älteste Kind geboren?
items.text: In which year was the oldest child born?

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

H92.question: H92
H92.name: H92
H92.label: What is this child's first name?

items.text_de: Wie ist der Vorname dieses Kindes?
items.text: What is this child's first name?

H93.question: H93
H93.name: H93
H93.label: Does this child currently go to school?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind derzeit eine Schule?
items.text: Does this child currently go to school?

answers.label_de: Nein, ist schon zu alt, um eine Schule zu besuchen
answers.label: No, already too old to go to school

answers.label_de: Nein, ist noch zu jung, um zur Schule zu besuchen
answers.label: No, still too young to go to school

answers.label_de: Nein, besucht aus anderen Gründen keine Schule
answers.label: No, does not go to school for other reasons

H94.name: H94
H94.label: Which school does this child currently go to?

items.text_de: Welche Schule besucht dieses Kind derzeit?
items.text: Which school does this child currently go to?

H95.question: H95
H95.name: H95
H95.label: Does this child currently attend a special class for refugee children (for example, welcome class, preparatory class or transition class)?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind derzeit eine spezielle Klasse für Flüchtlingskinder (zum Beispiel Willkommensklasse, Vorbereitungsklasse oder Übergangsklasse)?
items.text: Does this child currently attend a special class for refugee children (for example, welcome class, preparatory class or transition class)?

H96.question: H96
H96.name: H96
H96.label: Does this child receive special language assistance at school?

items.text_de: Bekommt dieses Kind spezielle Sprachförderung in der Schule?
items.text: Does this child receive special language assistance at school?

H97.question: H97
H97.name: H97
H97.label: Does this child usually attend school all day?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind die Schule meistens ganztags?
items.text: Does this child usually attend school all day?

H98.question: H98
H98.name: H98
H98.label: Does this child attend a day care group or similar care facility at school?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind einen Schulhort oder eine vergleichbare Betreuung in der Schule?
items.text: Does this child attend a day care group or similar care facility at school?

H99.question: H99
H99.name: H99
H99.label: Are there also other people (not members of the household) who regularly look after the child?

items.text_de: Gibt es daneben noch Personen (ohne Haushaltsangehörige), die dieses Kind regelmäßig betreuen?
items.text: Are there also other people (not members of the household) who regularly look after the child?

items.text_de: Ja, bezahlte Betreuungsperson kommt ins Haus
items.text: Yes, a paid carer comes to the house

items.text_de: Ja, Verwandte
items.text: Yes, relatives

items.text_de: Ja, Freunde / Bekannte / Nachbarn
items.text: Yes, friends/acquaintances/neighbours

items.text_de: Ja, ehrenamtlicher Betreuer
items.text: Yes, volunteer carers

items.text_de: Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, none of these

H100.question: H100
H100.name: H100
H100.label: Does the child currently take part in one of more of the following activities outside school?

items.text_de: Nimmt dieses Kind derzeit an einer oder mehreren der folgenden Aktivitäten außerhalb der Schule teil?
items.text: Does the child currently take part in one of more of the following activities outside school?

items.text_de: Sprachförderung
items.text: Language assistance

items.text_de: Sport, Tanzen, Gymnastik, Ballett
items.text: Sports, dancing, gymnastics, ballet

items.text_de: Musikunterricht oder Gesangsunterricht
items.text: Music lessons or singing lessons

items.text_de: Kunsterziehung / Malen
items.text: Art classes / painting

items.text_de: Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, none of the above

H101.question: H101
H101.name: H101
H101.label: Does this child currently attend a nursery, kindergarten or a child day care centre?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind derzeit eine Kinderkrippe, einen Kindergarten oder eine Kindertageseinrichtung?
items.text: Does this child currently attend a nursery, kindergarten or a child day care centre?

H102.question: H102
H102.name: H102
H102.label: How many hours per day does this child attend the nursery, kindergarten or day care centre?

items.text_de: Wie viele Stunden besucht dieses Kind die Kinderkrippe, den Kindergarten oder die Kindertageseinrichtung pro Tag?
items.text: How many hours per day does this child attend the nursery, kindergarten or day care centre?

items.text_de: Stunden pro Tag
items.text: Hours per day

H103.question: H103
H103.name: H103
H103.label: Do you know that every child in Germany from the age of one year is entitled to such childcare (eg creche, kindergarten, kindergarten, child minder)?

items.text_de: Wissen Sie, dass es in Deutschland für Kinder ab dem Alter von einem Jahr die Möglichkeit der Kinderbetreuung gibt (z. B. Kinderkrippe, Kindergarten, Kita, Tagesmutter)?
items.text: Do you know that every child in Germany from the age of one year is entitled to such childcare (eg creche, kindergarten, kindergarten, child minder)?

H104.question: H104
H104.name: H104
H104.label: Do you know that every child in Germany from the age of one year is entitled to such childcare (eg crèche, kindergarten, kindergarten, child minder)?

items.text_de: Wissen Sie, dass jedes Kind in Deutschland ab dem Alter von einem Jahr einen Anspruch auf so eine Kinderbetreuung hat (z. B. Kinderkrippe, Kindergarten, Kita, Tagesmutter)?
items.text: Do you know that every child in Germany from the age of one year is entitled to such childcare (eg crèche, kindergarten, kindergarten, child minder)?

H105.question: H105
H105.name: H105
H105.label: Would it be possible for you to use such an offer for childcare (eg nursery, kindergarten, kindergarten, childminder)?

items.text: Would it be possible for you to use such an offer for childcare (eg nursery, kindergarten, kindergarten, childminder)?

H210.question: H210
H210.name: H210
H210.label: That was the part of the questionnaire that was about your household and the people in your household. The following question is about you personally.

items.text_de: Das war der Teil des Fragebogens, bei dem es um Ihren Haushalt und die Personen in Ihrem Haushalt ging. Bei den nun folgenden Frage geht es um Sie persönlich.
items.text: That was the part of the questionnaire that was about your household and the people in your household. The following question is about you personally.
